mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_MAIN_IMAGE, C.CART_NO, C.PRODUCT_NO, C.EMAIL, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, C.PRODUCT_COUNT, (P.PRODUCT_PRICE * C.PRODUCT_COUNT) AS PRODUCT_TOTAL_PRICE FROM PRODUCT P, CART C WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO, EMAIL, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_COUNT) VALUES (SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{product_no}, #{product_count})
